title: Atsushi Chiba: mechanical engineer

description: Episode of Series "The Faces of Japan". Atsushi Chiba is a 30 year old engineer at an auto-parts factory north of Tokyo. This documentary focuses on the technical and social aspects of his working environment and touches on attitudes and aspirations in his family life.
